Class GameoverHandler

java.lang.Object
controller.GameoverHandler
public class GameoverHandler extends Object
Handles user input and logic for the Game Over screen. This class processes mouse interactions to allow the user to return to the main menu.

  • Constructor Details

    • GameoverHandler

      public GameoverHandler(GameModel gameModel, InputHandler inputHandler)
      Constructs a GameoverHandler.
      Parameters:
      gameModel - The main game model, used to change the game state.
      inputHandler - The input handler for detecting mouse events.

  • Method Details

    • handleInput

      public void handleInput()
      Handles user input on the game over screen. Checks for mouse hovering and clicks on the "Return to Menu" button.

    • getMenuButtonBounds

      public Rectangle getMenuButtonBounds()
      Returns:
      The bounding box of the main menu button.

    • isMenuHover

      public boolean isMenuHover()
      Returns:
      True if the mouse is currently hovering over the main menu button, false otherwise.
